author: Wanja Muhoro
creator: Wanja Muhoro
description:
Kenyan girl chronicles is about self-growth, self-love, self-care and all about self!
It is about experiences, interviews and stories that matter to everybody.....
Enjoy the podcast as it’s made out of love, life and laughter 
All the rollercoasters of life are welcomed!

items.content:
In this episode, I'm introducing a KGC series where I give my two cents about trending stories in social media and giving you an opportunity to engage and say your piece😊! In today's episode, I will be talking about a story that has been trending for a couple of days where a young girl broke her virginity and ended up contracting Herpes and HIV. Let me know what y'all think about this story @kgcpodcast on Instagram.

--- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/wanja96/message

items.title: My two cents 🧐 💭

items.content:
I am so happy to be releasing the third season of Kenyan Girl Chronicles! Thank you for the support! In this episode I will be talking about scenarios from a couple of tv shows and talking about how we should remember to love ourselves correctly so no one will love you the wrong way and accept it.

---

items.title: Loving you right!

items.content:
In this episode, we are answering the question: Is it your partner’s responsibility to know your needs and wants or should it be you to communicate it to them? Let me know your opinion by messaging me @kenyangirlchronicles on Instagram

items.title: Communication 🗣👉🏾👈🏾

items.content:
In this short episode, I will read you the well known poem by Maya Angeleo “Still I Rise”. The aim of this episode is to allow you to interpret the poem in your own words and how it lifts you up as a woman. Enjoy😘♥️

items.title: Love? Lust? A bit of both?🤷🏽‍♀️

items.content:
It’s valentines and most of us are thinking where our significant other or loved one is going to take us (or where we will take them). My question to you is… have you thought of taking yourself out and shower yourself with humongous love♥️😻. Enjoy the episode and don’t forget to rate subscribe and like the episode☺️

items.title: //Hello 2021...//

items.content:
In this episode, I get to share how my phone decided to find another owner😭😅 and how I was in shock maybe still is up to date😟. This episode is funny and sad at the same time, but we still emerged great🥰. Enjoy listening to this episode as it was recorded with love and laughter... daaahh😉. Do not forget to follow me @wanja_muhoro in Instagram. Byyyeeeee👋🏽

--- 

Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/wanja96/message
